encryption.title: Vote Encryption Type
encryption.subtitle: Choose the level of confidentiality and security for voting

option0.title: No encryption (Standard)
option0.description: Public votes, real-time results. Ideal for polls and transparent voting.

option1.title: Option 1: ElGamal
option1.description: Encrypted voting with decryption after closing. Confidentiality + result counting.

option2.description: Encryption + mathematical proof of validity. Total anonymity with nullifier.

description.part1: DEMOCRATIX is a decentralized voting platform built with

hero.title: Decentralized Voting
hero.subtitle: Transparent, Secure, Immutable
hero.description: DEMOCRATIX revolutionizes voting with MultiversX blockchain technology. Every vote counts, every voice is heard.

homeHero.description: Decentralized and transparent voting platform built on the MultiversX blockchain.

about.title: About DEMOCRATIX
about.subtitle: The future of democratic voting is here, powered by blockchain technology

what.title: What is DEMOCRATIX?
what.description1: DEMOCRATIX is a revolutionary decentralized voting platform built on the MultiversX blockchain. We combine the power of blockchain technology with advanced cryptographic methods to create a voting system that is transparent, secure, and immutable.
what.description2: Our platform ensures that every vote is counted accurately, voter anonymity is preserved, and election results cannot be tampered with. Whether for corporate governance, community decisions, or democratic elections, DEMOCRATIX provides a trustworthy solution.

step1.title: Connect Your Wallet
step1.description: Use your MultiversX wallet to connect to the platform securely. Your wallet serves as your digital identity and voting credential.

step2.title: Browse Elections
step2.description: Explore active, pending, and upcoming elections. Each election includes detailed information, candidate profiles, and voting deadlines.

step3.title: Cast Your Vote
step3.description: Select your preferred candidate and submit your vote. Your choice is encrypted and recorded on the blockchain, ensuring anonymity and immutability.

step4.title: Track Results
step4.description: Monitor election progress in real-time. View vote counts, participation rates, and detailed statistics for each candidate.

step5.title: Verify Transparency
step5.description: All votes and results are publicly verifiable on the blockchain. Anyone can audit the election while preserving voter privacy.

blockchain.title: Blockchain-Based
blockchain.description: Built on MultiversX for high-speed, low-cost, and secure transactions

anonymous.title: Anonymous Voting
anonymous.description: Cryptographic techniques ensure your vote remains private and anonymous

transparent.title: Transparent Results
transparent.description: All votes are publicly verifiable on the blockchain ledger

decentralized.title: Decentralized
decentralized.description: No single point of control or failure. The power is distributed

secure.title: Secure & Immutable
secure.description: Once recorded, votes cannot be altered, deleted, or tampered with

ipfs.title: IPFS Storage
ipfs.description: Election metadata and images stored on decentralized IPFS network

q1.question: What is blockchain voting?
q1.answer: Blockchain voting uses distributed ledger technology to record votes in a transparent, secure, and immutable way. Each vote is a transaction on the blockchain, making it impossible to alter or delete after it's been cast.

q2.question: Is my vote anonymous?
q2.answer: Yes! DEMOCRATIX uses advanced cryptographic techniques to ensure your vote is completely anonymous. While your transaction is recorded on the blockchain, your actual vote choice is encrypted and cannot be linked to your wallet address.

q3.question: Do I need cryptocurrency to vote?
q3.answer: Yes, you need a small amount of EGLD (MultiversX's native token) to pay for transaction fees (gas). The cost is minimal - typically less than $0.01 per vote.

q4.question: What is IPFS and why do you use it?
q4.answer: IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) is a decentralized storage network. We use it to store election descriptions, candidate information, and images in a distributed way, ensuring data availability and censorship resistance.

q5.question: Can I change my vote after submitting?
q5.answer: No. Once a vote is recorded on the blockchain, it's immutable and cannot be changed. This ensures the integrity of the election results. Make sure you've selected the correct candidate before confirming.

q6.question: How do I create an election?
q6.answer: Connect your wallet, navigate to the 'Create Election' page, fill in the election details (title, description, dates), add candidates with their information, and submit the transaction. Your election will be live on the blockchain!

q7.question: What happens after an election closes?
q7.answer: When an election ends, it moves to 'Closed' status. The election creator must then finalize the results, which calculates and permanently records the final vote counts on the blockchain.

q8.question: Is DEMOCRATIX open source?
q8.answer: Yes! DEMOCRATIX smart contracts and frontend code are open source. You can audit the code, verify the logic, and even contribute to the project on our GitHub repository.

q9.question: Which networks does DEMOCRATIX support?
q9.answer: Currently, DEMOCRATIX is deployed on MultiversX Devnet (for testing), Testnet (for pre-production), and will soon be available on Mainnet for production use.

q10.question: How can I trust the results?
q10.answer: All votes are recorded on the MultiversX blockchain, which is public and transparent. Anyone can verify the vote counts using blockchain explorers. The smart contract logic is open source and auditable.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Democratic Voting?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who trust DEMOCRATIX for transparent and secure elections

elgamal.title: ElGamal Encryption Setup

generate.title: Encryption keys generation
generate.description: This operation will generate an ElGamal key pair for your election. The public key will be stored on the blockchain and will allow voters to encrypt their votes. The private key must be securely saved by you, the organizer.

warning.title: Important
warning.message: You will need to download and save your private key. Without it, you won't be able to decrypt votes after the election closes.
